chaofanmod:relic.Stool.NAME: Stool
chaofanmod:relic.Stool.FLAVOR: The man with big nose hits enemies with this.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add #yStrike to names of ALL Attacks in your draw pile.

chaofanmod:relic.SpiritFire.NAME: Spirit Fire
DESCRIPTIONS: You may combat at campfire to get reward.

chaofanmod:relic.OldPhone.NAME: Old Phone
chaofanmod:relic.OldPhone.FLAVOR: It's good to take photo with it.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Your UI looks like shooting using a phone.

chaofanmod:relic.SpotLight.NAME: Spotlight
chaofanmod:relic.SpotLight.FLAVOR: I should only see what I'm focusing.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can only see UI near your mouse.

chaofanmod:relic.MarkOfChaos.NAME: Mark of Chaos
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Events have one available option only.

chaofanmod:relic.ManualOfMerchant.NAME: Manual of Merchant
chaofanmod:relic.ManualOfMerchant.FLAVOR: Maybe I can sell something in the Spire, too.
DESCRIPTIONS: If you pay #b%d #yGold at the start of combat, gain [E] at the start of your turn in this combat.

chaofanmod:relic.ManholeCover.NAME: Manhole Cover
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Whenever you play a card, all enemies gain #y1 #yBlock.

chaofanmod:relic.TauntMask.NAME: Taunt Mask
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Enemies start combat with available attack intent with highest damage. This doesn't affect enemies who don't attack first turn.

chaofanmod:relic.BlessOfNetwork.NAME: Bless of Network
chaofanmod:relic.BlessOfNetwork.FLAVOR: Can you connect me to the internet, please?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a card from a random friend to your hand.

chaofanmod:relic.ZMap.NAME: Z Map
chaofanmod:relic.ZMap.FLAVOR: This isn't a bridge! This is just a pipe!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can only see distributions of room amount instead of paths on map.
